article.title: Draper Labs to Provide Micro Circuit Wafers for Trident II Guidance System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Charles Stark Draper Laboratories Incorporated, Cambridge, Massachusetts, is being awarded a $120,818,538 modification under previously awarded firm-fixed-price, fixed-price-incentive, cost-plus-incentive-fee contract to provide Trident II (D5) Guidance System micro circuit wafers and Strategic Systems Programs alterations materials. Strategic Systems Programs, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
